page.title: 19Religion in the Area.
page.content: In Skewen we have 3 churches these are St.Mary's, St.John's and All Saint's Church.There are 13 chapels spread around the village.There used to be many more but some have closed due to falling attendances.Some of the chapels conduct their services in the Welsh Language.The Different chapels have different denominations.There are Calvinist, Baptist, Independent, Methodist and many more. Also in Skewen we have the Salvation Army which also holds services in their church. In the area as a whole there are also Catholic Churches.Many of the chapels and churches in the district suffer from the same problems.There seems to be a distinct tendency in most areas to suffer from a lack of attendace which leads to a subsequent lack of funds.
